text:
Q: How to import SVG to Unity 2018.2 A:

SVGs are supported natively in Unity 6.3 (November 2025)!

Once you import the asset, go into the UI Builder, set the Vector image as a background image of a VisualElement or the source of an Image component.

Here's a quick intro by the staff on Unity Discussions (where my AI found the answer):

https://discussions.unity.com/t/vector-graphics-in-ui-toolkit/1683117

Here's the announcement (See the UI section at the bottom)

https://unity.com/blog/unity-6-3-lts-is-now-available
